Springdale.Northwest Arkansas Mall:
The Northwest Arkansas Mall is the primary fully enclosed retail hub in the Northwest Arkansas region, located in Fayetteville.


== History ==

The shopping center began as Northwest Arkansas Plaza, a single-level mall of 570,000 square feet (53,000 m2) leasable square feet. There were originally three anchors, Sears, JCPenney and Dillard's.
